SKT_FIRST.name: Wire Bind
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Increased Speed</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000041_1_1]</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Increased Speed</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000041_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Wire Blitz
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After using this skill, reduces the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Grieving Orpheus</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy. After using this skill, reduces the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Grieving Orpheus</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000041_2_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>비탄의 오르페우스</color>의 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>【悲嘆のオルフェウス】</color>のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Grieving Orpheus
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's and target's Speed.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Increases Evasion Increase duration by 1 turn

description: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's and target's Speed.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신과 대상의 속도가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは、自分と対象のスピードが高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000041_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000041_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000041_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상 한 명에게 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>표식</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、敵単体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>標的</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。
